{-# LANGUAGE DeriveDataTypeable #-}

module Ermine.Syntax.Literal (Literal(..)) where

import Data.Data hiding (Fixity(..))
import Data.Int

-- | Primitive literal values used by patterns, terms and core.
data Literal
  = Int     !Int
  | Int64   !Int64
  | Byte    !Int8
  | Short   !Int16
  | String  String
  | Char    !Char
  | Float   !Float
  | Double  !Double
  deriving (Eq,Ord,Show,Read,Data,Typeable)
